quote: One thing I've learned to appreciate as I've gotten a little older is direct forms of communication.
author: Billy Corgan

quote: I was in college for organizational communication and politics because I was just fascinated by influence. I wondered how people have influence, not because I wanted to inspire the world - yet.
author: Brendon Burchard

quote: Writing only leads to more writing.
author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: Contractions, 'U' for 'you' and the like are wonderful to make communication brief and efficient - but we wouldn't want all our talk to be only brief and efficient. Taking pauses out of language would be like taking the net away from a tennis game. Where would all the fun go?
author: Pico Iyer

quote: Mental communication without verbalization... all space is made up of waves and we are constantly sending and receiving messages from our brain.
author: Tina Louise

author: Diane Lane

author: Diane Lane

quote: You need to set a tone at the top that inspires trust - and encourages open and honest 2-way communication. So you hear the brutal facts, and you listen to the good news and the bad news - so that, in the spirit of continuous improvement, you can make changes.
author: Denise Morrison

quote: For there to be communication within a couple, it is enough for there to be only one person who communicates or who really wants to communicate. author: Pedro Almodovar

quote: What I try to get beyond is playing music at people and, instead, to play music with people because audience members are constantly part of the experience. author: Al Jarreau

quote: A drawing is essentially a private work, related only to the artist's own needs; a 'finished' statue or canvas is essentially a public, presented work - related far more directly to the demands of communication.
author: John Berger

quote: Unfortunately, changing forms of Internet communication are quickly outpacing laws and technology designed to allow for the lawful intercept of communication content.
author: James Comey

quote: Just as characteristic, perhaps, is the intellectual interdependence created through the development of the modern media of communication: post, telegraph, telephone, and popular press.
author: Christian Lous Lange

author: Michael E. Gerber

author: Jacques Barzun

quote: Writing is a communication.
author: Theodore Sturgeon

quote: It would be extremely naive to conclude anything other than the following: America's most vital secrets are in the hands of our adversaries because Secretary Clinton intentionally avoided using official government communication systems.

author: Victoria Osteen

quote: My wife and I have built trust with our children and have always had open communication.
author: Rick Springfield

quote: I understand why people went nuts for 'The Artist.' We use words so much, it's nice to be able to explore a different way of communication, to be able to express silently what someone - or something - is thinking or feeling.

quote: On the other hand, the American public possesses a great resilience and strength, and good risk communication strategies can tap into and even amplify those assets.
author: Patrick J. Kennedy

quote: I like people who refuse to speak until they are ready to speak.
author: Lillian Hellman

quote: In a way song writing can almost be detrimental, because suddenly you find an outlet that is a kind of cheating. You don't need to have direct communication. You can say, 'I can't describe it to you, but I will record it and send it to you.'

quote: I believe in communication; books communicate ideas and make bridges between people.
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: The idea of an animated film is you always kind of get a little bit daunted by it as a filmmaker because it feels like a lot of your communication is going to be with computer artists, and you're going to have to kind of channel the movie through extra pairs of hands.
author: Peter Jackson

quote: I never even wanted to be an actress. I studied mass communication and wanted to study law in Newcastle, for which I even got a scholarship. But by then, I had started modelling. quote: With clearly defined roles and a focus on communication, it's much easier to make your company come across as well-organized and on top of things - because it actually is.
author: Kathryn Minshew

quote: I have a very open line of communication with both my children.
author: Gloria Estefan

quote: I like television. I still believe that television is the most powerful form of communication on Earth - I just hate what is being done with it.

quote: But despite the universality of URLs, we often forget that they're not just a handy way to address network resources. They're also valuable communication tools.
author: Jesse James Garrett

quote: Maintaining a positive working relationship with Mexico's leadership will also be crucial to increasing communication and trade. I plan to personally maintain those relationships.
author: Doug Ducey

quote: It's a difficult undertaking. I've been married for four years and I see this movie as a cautionary tale about people who've gone deeply out of communication.
author: Mark Ruffalo

quote: With 'The Keep,' I began with a theory about pitting the isolated disconnection of the gothic realm against present-day hyperconnectedness. author: Jennifer Egan

quote: I didn't know folk music growing up, no. It's something I've come to study, really, because I think there's so much to learn from traditional music in the sense of the way music began as a way of communication, the traveling storyteller, the bard, the minstrels.
author: P. J. Harvey

quote: Music and politics are in essence about communication. Without over-stretching the analogy I do feel a sense of rhythm is important in getting your message across.
author: Charles Kennedy

quote: Communication is the key, and it's one thing I had to learn-to talk to the actors. I was so involved with the visual and technical aspects that I would forget about the actors.
author: Steve Buscemi

quote: You should have mechanisms of communication, like faxes, which are obviously getting removed from offices because nobody uses them anymore. Faxes are great when e-mail doesn't work. I wouldn't be throwing them away.
author: Mikko Hypponen

quote: In a way, 'Like Crazy' keys into our generation, this idea of now we can still be in communication. Where do the boundaries of relationships end?
author: Felicity Jones

quote: Being able to communicate with a loved one that you haven't talked to in a while because of some communication break makes their life and your life in a much better place.
author: John Paul DeJoria

quote: Nearly every communication method we invent eventually conveys unwanted commercial messages.
author: Jamais Cascio

quote: Mothers tend to be more direct. Fathers talk to other fathers about their kids more metaphorically. It's a different way of communication.
author: Richard Louv

quote: If I'm doing a show on Sunday at 7 P.M., that wouldn't be the same show that I'd do at 11 P.M. on a Saturday - it's a different room at a different time of day with different sensibilities. author: Michael Che

quote: Around the time I began starving, in the early eighties, the visual image had begun to supplant text as culture's primary mode of communication, a radical change because images work so differently than words: They're immediate, they hit you at levels way beneath intellect, they come fast and furious.
author: Caroline Knapp

quote: I speak onstage to try to establish some method of communication. The songs are supposed to be a way of communicating. But speech and drinks and sometimes chocolates are also a way of communicating.
author: Jarvis Cocker

quote: The more articulate one is, the more dangerous words become.
author: May Sarton

quote: Our ancient forebears who learned to synchronize the movements of dance were those with the capacity to predict what others around them were going to do and signal to others what they wanted to do next. author: Daniel Levitin

quote: If you are approachable, if you keep your line of communication open, then very often, you get to hear what you need to hear.
author: Arundhati Bhattacharya

quote: We all know the Internet didn't explode until it became a commercial enterprise. Space communication will probably have the same characteristic.
author: Vint Cerf

quote: You should know that I've been hearing-impaired, not quite since birth, but I've been wearing hearing aids since I was 13, so I'm very conscious of the difficulty of voice communication.
author: Vint Cerf

quote: 'Arrival' talks very little about language and how to precisely dissect a foreign language. It's more a film on intuition and communication by intuition, the language of intuition.
author: Denis Villeneuve

quote: Communication isn't just directing a guy on what to do: it's passing the information along to the guy that's next to you, and that's where we make the calls come to life.
author: Dan Quinn

quote: If the expansion of a global legal regime for communication technologies gains traction, the effects to the global economy as well as our individual liberties will be severe.
author: Marsha Blackburn

quote: A writer is someone who can make a riddle out of an answer.
author: Karl Kraus

quote: No ideas and the ability to express them - that's a journalist.
author: Karl Kraus

quote: One question that often comes up is why, in this age of blogs and tweets and instant digital communication of all kinds, it still takes so long to publish a book.
author: Erik Larson

quote: Just so everyone knows, we're not a photo-sharing company. I don't see photos on 'Instagram' as art. They're much more about communication.
author: Kevin Systrom

quote: 'Instagram' is a media company. I think we're about visual media. I explain ourselves as a disruptive entertainment platform that enables communication through visual media. I don't think it's just photos.
author: Kevin Systrom

quote: The first work of the director is to set a mood so that the actor's work can take place, so that the actor can create. And in order to do that, you have to communicate, communicate with the actors. And direction is about communication on all levels.
author: William Friedkin

quote: If you don't know each other you spend time doing research together, having dinner, and talking about your lives. You try to find common ground. Once you're shooting, the pressures are so intense; you really want to have a channel of communication open to you already.
author: Edward Zwick

quote: Before language, cavemen simply grunted, and then they used the club. Communication changed that. It's the mechanism that created civilization and prevents its own destruction.
author: Greg Gutfeld

quote: Language commonly stresses only one side of any interaction.
author: Gregory Bateson

quote: If we ever established contact with intelligent life on another world, there would be barriers to communication. First, they would be many light years away, so signals would take many years to reach them: there would be no scope for quick repartee. There might be an IQ gap.
author: Martin Rees

quote: The process of communication with the afterlife - more of an exchange than a conversation - has always fascinated me.
author: Rory MacLean

quote: Instantaneous and mass communication is the mother of mass naivety. Should we then lose hope? Is there any hope? But to lose hope is as dangerous as to nurture false hope. Where then can we find hope that is responsible?
author: Tariq Ramadan

quote: I studied B.Sc electronics to be an engineer and later did masters in communication and advertising. I loved engineering for what it could accomplish to make our lives easier. But, I realised that it was not my passion.
author: R. Madhavan

quote: As a black woman, there's so much pride and communication through hair. It's naturally something that you are excited to embellish on and be creative about.
author: Kelela

quote: Perhaps the people of Twitter are more amenable to your babbling than your immediate family, but that doesn't necessarily make digital communication a beneficial distraction when we have an immediate social environment.
author: Robert Rinder

quote: Communication services need interoperability to succeed - and Loopt is the first such service since SMS that is available across all major U.S. wireless carriers.
author: Sam Altman

quote: People just want to dig; they want to dance. They don't want to work all through the night, and neither do I. I like getting 'out there,' but communication should be occurring on more levels than heavy-laden philosophical.
author: Kurt Elling

quote: The way you communicate an idea is different than the way you communicate a product.
author: Frank Luntz

quote: I don't understand why people whose entire lives or their corporate success depends on communication, and yet they are led on occasion by CEOs who cannot talk their way out of a paper bag and don't care to.
author: Frank Luntz

quote: There are people still in the Republican Party that I believe practice the communication of anger, of disappointment, of regret, of pain, of sorrow, of suffering. That's not what the American people want to hear.
author: Frank Luntz

quote: Republicans use think tanks to come up with a lot of their messages. The think tanks are the single worst, most undisciplined example of communication I've ever seen.
author: Frank Luntz

quote: It has to be able to play at the maximum expression and communication in every style, and the only way you can do that is - like Verdi said - working with a file, every day, little by little, until the orchestra's collective qualities emerge.
author: James Levine

quote: The eventual place the American army should take on the western front was to a large extent influenced by the vital question of communication and supply.
author: Kelly Miller

quote: The late 20th century had just enough communication abilities to allow superstar-ness and communality to happen. It was a musical renaissance that rivals the visual one that happened in the 1400s.
author: Daryl Hall

quote: The technology, called near-field communication, involves a microchip that can send and receive data across very short distances, about four inches. Instead of swiping a credit card, you hold your phone near a reader and let the data zip between the two devices.
author: Daniel Lyons

quote: There's been nobody who stays in more communication and listens to veterans more than I do.
author: Rodney Frelinghuysen

quote: CBS's Major Garrett writes in 'National Journal' about a new version of the 'stray voltage' theory of communication in which the president purposefully overstates his case knowing that it will create controversy.
author: John Dickerson

quote: Honest communication is a rare thing.
author: Taylor Sheridan

quote: I am a straight, non-alcoholic, non-partying guy who speaks straight. I have no knowledge of literature. This is my language of communication, and what I see, what I observe, I reflect.
author: Yo Yo Honey Singh

quote: I feel like communication is the same whether you're cooking for someone or singing or writing a song or writing a play or ordering from McDonald's.
author: Tituss Burgess

quote: Although social media is a relatively new form of communication, it has become the primary way retailers and customers are interfacing.
author: Ryan Holmes

quote: It's extraordinary that revolutions taking place around the world were sparked by communication on the Internet.
author: Robbie Robertson

quote: What I like in a good author is not what he says but what he whispers.
author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: On 'Check Your Head' and 'Ill Communication,' most of the lyrics are much more, 'OK, you take that, and I'll say that' - they're split up.
author: Mike D

quote: Communication is important.
author: Douglas Booth

quote: Technique is communication: the two words are synonymous in conductors.
author: Leonard Bernstein

quote: I'll give the director what he wants, but please explain the requirement. If it reaches me, then there's communication.
author: Vijay Sethupathi

quote: I slept for four years. I didn't study much of anything. I majored in something called communication arts.
author: Don DeLillo

quote: I believe that no matter what you do in life, if you learn the basics through theater, it will help you in everything else - problem solving, communication, discipline, all of that stuff.
author: Laura Linney

quote: It still amazes me how many musicians aren't really interested in engaging with their audience at all. Alfred Brendel, a pianist for whom I have the greatest respect, has described performance as a sacred communion between the artist and the composer. But what about the audience? Music is communication, a two-way street.
author: Charles Hazlewood

quote: I hate the amount of communication, the obligation that you have just by owning a phone.
author: Lucas Till

quote: As I've gotten to know myself over the years, I realised I'm kind of a sweet, sensitive guy, a shy guy, and communication is not something I'm so good at.
author: Christian Slater

quote: Scientology helps me in acting to focus on communication.
author: Erika Christensen

quote: I can be a binger when it comes to information, but most of the time, I'm pretty good, and I try to focus on my own life and personal communication.
author: Erika Christensen

quote: After I finished my degree in Mass Communication in Manipal, I enrolled for a cinematography course in Pune Film Institute. That is when Nandini Reddy, the director of 'Ala Modalaindi,' convinced me to act.
author: Nithya Menen

quote: There are a lot of things that Slack gives you that email doesn't when you think about internal use. Switching to Slack from email for internal communication gives you a lot more transparency.
author: Stewart Butterfield

quote: If you work at a 10,000-person company, and you're using e-mail as the primary means of communication, then you probably have access to a couple hundredths of 1 percent of all the communications happening across the company. But if you use Slack, you might have access to 10 or 20 percent.
author: Stewart Butterfield

quote: I've worked very hard in this book to keep the lines of communication open. I don't want to turn someone away from this information for partisan political reasons.
author: Jared Diamond

quote: I am still cautiously hopeful about the potential of the Internet. But it seems that the greatest revolution in communication has been hijacked by commercial values.
author: Beeban Kidron

quote: I think everyone has shame about something, whether it's a lack of a relationship with a child or maybe their weight or a lack of communication within their marriage. Everyone can relate to that because we all have something that we're like, 'God, I can work on that,' or, 'I wish I was better at doing this.'
author: Chrissy Metz

quote: Obama better understood community organisation and peer-to-peer communication than any recent candidate, and we are applying that lesson.
author: Douglas Alexander

quote: What we are going to offer is not a one-way communication, but one-to-one communication.
author: Douglas Alexander

quote: The mind, in proportion as it is cut off from free communication with nature, with revelation, with God, with itself, loses its life, just as the body droops when debarred from the air and the cheering light from heaven.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: My hectic work schedule does not often permit me time to visit temples, but my conversations with God don't depend on idol worship. Inside my heart, I have developed and sustained a direct communication with Him.
author: Emraan Hashmi

quote: I enjoy very much communication. I think that scientists need to communicate.
author: Anthony Fauci

quote: A painting has a lot of advantages over other forms of communication. Unlike a movie, you don't have to put it into a machine and turn it on. It's just there every day. It's not limited by the element of time. It's a constant part of the home.
author: Thomas Kinkade

quote: There's this proud American tradition of worrying about the power of communication companies. That going all the way back to the founding, we've tried to limit the power of monopolies that played a role in our democracy.
author: Franklin Foer

quote: Hunting for malware requires highly specialized knowledge of the intricacies of the domain name system - the protocol that allows us to type email addresses and website names to initiate communication. DNS enables our words to set in motion a chain of connections between servers, which in turn delivers the results we desire.
author: Franklin Foer

quote: Even in developing markets, we're seeing the growth of digital communication is proceeding at a very rapid pace.
author: Irene Rosenfeld

quote: All the people who run agencies, all the important people in agencies have taken communication courses, marketing courses, advertising courses, and courses basically teach advertising as a science, and advertising is so far from a science it isn't even funny. Advertising is an art.
author: George Lois

quote: The 1960s was a heroic age in the history of the art of communication - the audacious movers and shakers of those times bear no resemblance to the cast of characters in 'Mad Men.'
author: George Lois

quote: Communication between band-mates is imperative. Communication is the key to any healthy relationship. author: Phil Anselmo

quote: I think there's a fear of disconnect sometimes; communication is a huge issue for all of us, from adults to kids, as far as our face-to-face time and our ability to interact with each other without isolating itself to a phone. I think that has to be something that's very challenging.
author: Jim Rash

quote: With my natural communication abilities, I could probably gather a crowd even without the Spirit.
author: Francis Chan

quote: Online, you're providing each other with the good aspects of being together as far as communication and support, but you don't have to deal with the realities of paying bills together, or being annoyed when they leave the toilet seat up or don't put the food away in the fridge.
author: Nev Schulman

quote: To conclude: good journalism is one of the models of good conversation and communication in the wider social context.

quote: Throughout my scientific career, my wife has been my most constant collaborator. Her experimental skill made major contributions to the work; she has eased for me beyond measure the difficulties of communication that accompany deafness; her encouragement and fortitude have been my strongest supports.
author: John Cornforth

quote: With docs, there's often a very direct communication between the filmmaker and the audience. With narrative movies, we leave it a little bit more open.
author: Tom McCarthy

quote: My grandmother died in 1991 and I was born in '86. We only met once, but I didn't speak English and she didn't speak Spanish - so we had a communication problem.
author: Oona Chaplin

quote: In high school, sometimes you just can't help who you have a crush on and who you fall for! If you fall for one of your friend's exes, for example, it's really all about communication and telling your friend. Hiding it is never a good thing.
author: Jillian Rose Reed

quote: Continuing on my theme of backing inclusive innovations, I am optimistic of the success of Uniphore. Man-machine communication is one of the more complex problems to solve. Uniphore's vision lends possibility of finding a solution to this very difficult problem, and the company has already made substantial progress.
author: Kris Gopalakrishnan

quote: The knowledge we have of communication among cells does not permit my giving you a sophisticated understanding.
author: Paul Greengard

quote: Why do only the Latin script when Nokia has a billion consumers? Typography is the bedrock of communication; it can really connect people.
author: Bruno Maag

quote: Normally, in the presence of radiation, communication links fail. But with autonomous robots, you don't need communications.
author: Vijay Kumar

quote: I like to read, especially nonfiction. I love learning, so I study languages, cook, learn basic HTML, and enjoy other activities that stimulate communication and the dark recesses of my musician's brain.
author: Joshua Roman

quote: GPS is expensive because it is a very slow communication channel - you need to communicate with three or four satellites for an extended duration at 50 bits per second.
author: Robert Love

quote: Every month I do a webcast for 55,000 people, and it's a great tool, great communication vehicle.
author: Terry J. Lundgren

quote: Microsoft is committed to the ubiquity of the Skype experience - communication across every device and every platform will remain a primary focus.
author: Tony Bates

quote: Facebook is massive in scale and scope. Twitter is a public communication forum, but if I'm following you, you're not necessarily following me. LinkedIn is, simply, a professional network.
author: Jeff Weiner

quote: On occasion, I like to reread my grandfather's letters. While leafing through them, I'm saddened by what is being lost in modern communication. author: Kristina McMorris

quote: It's like there are all these languages available, especially in terms of image. Why confine yourself to only English? There's all these languages and possibilities and concepts to speak or communicate with.
author: William Wiley

quote: As soon as you judge communication a little more rigorously, there is a possibility that the message will not be democratized. I have to say what I believe to be right. I have to spread out the statement among all the means of expression available to us at present.

quote: The interest in the supernatural in a very generic sense and in the spiritual is not in itself a factor that helps the communication of the Christian faith.
author: Karl Lehmann

quote: We intend to keep the lines of communication open with the Defense Department so we can help our border law enforcement agencies navigate the equipment application process.
author: Henry Cuellar

quote: The two cultures of East and West are very different, and the priorities are very different. So when you understand that - if you are from this side or this side - when you understand that the other is different than you, and you respect these differences, you can build communication.
author: Ashraf Barhom

quote: I don't tweet. I prefer face-to-face communication and sometimes Instagram.
author: Elizabeth Jagger

quote: You know, my dad wasn't a photographer or filmmaker by profession, but on Sundays, he would take pictures of me and my family or his pals horseback riding, and it was a means of communication and affection, a means of not being so dysfunctional with each other.
author: Bruce Weber

quote: I can't be a hypocrite as a coach because as a player that's what I wanted. I wanted feedback, I wanted communication from the boss. I showed up for work, you can yell at me if you want, but I want input. So that's the kind of coach I want to be.
author: Adam Oates

quote: The goal of art-making in general is communication.
author: Will Cotton

quote: Even though I was manically overachieving and involved in everything, I still never felt like I belonged. author: Penelope Mitchell

quote: Politics have been changed forever because of people. The Internet is one of the tools that has helped. And it isn't just politics. author: Jeremy Heimans

quote: If listeners aren't carried away to Heaven, I'm failing.
author: La Monte Young

quote: Without television and mass communication, that knowledge wouldn't exist. So I think it actually has the possibility of turning people into more understanding and more empathetic people.

quote: My approach is so simple; every song I sing, every story I tell, every move I make, must move the audience to laughter, tears, or inspiration. Otherwise, why do it? It's the communication.

quote: As our country increasingly relies on electronic information storage and communication, it is imperative that our Government amend our information security laws accordingly.
author: Jo Ann Davis

quote: Just open, honest communication is the best thing in the world.
author: Brett Davern

quote: I respect the Japanese and especially like their execution and communication styles. Unlike the Koreans, they will not hit you from behind.
author: Terry Gou

quote: I am oblique; I think that has to do with my own nature. quote: I am fourth-generation deaf, which means everyone in my immediate family is deaf. So I grew up always having 100 percent accessibility to language and communication, which was wonderful and something so many deaf people don't have.
author: Shoshannah Stern

quote: Writing is learning to say nothing, more cleverly each day.
author: William Allingham

quote: All poetry has to do is to make a strong communication. All the poet has to do is listen. The poet is not an important fellow. There will also be another poet.
author: Stevie Smith

author: Theo de Raadt

quote: Sometimes there is a greater lack of communication in facile talking than in silence.
author: Faith Baldwin

quote: The first legislation that I produced relating to the Internet was a bill to overturn a restriction inside of the law that prohibited the Internet backbone from being used for anything other than research and scientific and educational communication.
author: Rick Boucher

quote: Communication is very important. And the arts do that, whether it's film or theater.
author: Anne Archer

quote: Religion unites man with God, or forms a communication between them; yet do they not say, 'God is infinite?' If God be infinite, no finite being can have communication or relation with him.

quote: When you stop talking, you've lost your customer. When you turn your back, you've lost her.

quote: In 1984, I turned to theater in the hopes of finding a more direct form of communication between me and my people.

quote: I've always thought of writing as sort of active communication.

quote: I'm in the role of helping these apes negotiate the human role. I'm just a temporary intermediary in what I think will be eventual communication between the two species.
